00 428 428 / Send a “Please Call Me” by dialing *120*7867# from any cell phone,
SMS ‘help’ to 31531, ‘Helpme GBV’ via skype
• People Opposing Women Abuse (POWA) www.powa.co.za, 0800 029 999
• Lifeline Domestic Violence helpline 0800 150 150
